sentences.english: All grocery shopping bags contain at least one stick of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 所有超市購物袋裏都裝着至少一根法式長棍麪包。

sentences.english: In recent years, we have produced a number of new varieties, shopping bags and lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 近年，我們又新生產了多個品種，購物袋以及孔明燈。

sentences.english: Clever uses of shopping bags in advertising campaigns by various companies.
sentences.chinese: 許多商家巧妙地利用購物袋來推廣自己的品牌。

sentences.english: For example, do you have any sort of shopping cart or shopping bag?
sentences.chinese: 例如，您有任何類型的購物車或購物袋嗎？

sentences.english: Shopping bags are provided for the customers' convenience.
sentences.chinese: 提供購物袋以方便顧客。

sentences.english: And You Can Even Get Shopping Bags And Original Receipts If You Want.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以得到購物袋，以及原始憑證，如果你想。

sentences.english: She threw in the latest addition and slammed the door.
sentences.chinese: 她趕緊把新用完的購物袋扔進去，砰地一聲關上櫥門。

sentences.english: Sinistre. Disastro” art exhibition in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 這個巨型購物袋建築是德國某藝術展上的作品。

sentences.english: Lee goes down well with the carrier bag people.
sentences.chinese: 李與購物袋公司的人打得火熱。

sentences.english: The grocery store is offering customers 5 cents for each shopping bag re-used.
sentences.chinese: 該雜貨店爲顧客重複使用每個購物袋給5美分。

sentences.english: The "six-pack abs" bags above are a prime example.
sentences.chinese: 上面的這種“六塊腹肌”購物袋，就是最好的例證。

sentences.english: Use re-usable shopping bags and give plastic a wide berth.
sentences.chinese: 使用可重複利用購物袋，告別塑料袋。

sentences.english: It seemed lost in her worn, old shopping bag.
sentences.chinese: 它在薩默斯太太那老舊的購物袋裏彷彿不見了蹤影。

sentences.english: I noticed she had only one small, flat bag with her after her shopping spree.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到她在大采購之後只拿着一個癟癟的小購物袋。

sentences.english: She held up a shopping bag.
I take my shopping bag, and Christiane and I head out.
sentences.chinese: 我就拿起購物袋，叫上克麗絲汀和我出去，上街去了。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
